ValidationRule.description: Once the status is set to Deposited it will no longer be able to change unless done by a System Administrator Profile, or a user with the Cashiering Receipting Permission Set.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status__c),"Deposited"), Text(Status__c) <> "Deposited", ISCHANGED(Status__c), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "System Administrator")), NOT($Permission.Cashiering_Receipting) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the status away from Deposited.
